data.name: Lonely Mountains: Downhill
data.detailed_description:
Just you and your bike - take it on a thrilling ride down an unspoiled mountain landscape. Make your way through thick forests, narrow trails and wild rivers. Race, jump, slide and try not to crash - all the way from the peak to the valley!



TIGHT & INTUITIVE CONTROLS



A custom physic system allows for fun and responsive controls. Carefully drop from boulder to boulder, sprint and jump over abysses or slide through muddy forest grounds.

TRAVEL TO THE LONELY MOUNTAINS



Ready to see the world? Different mountains await you on your adventure - each one featuring several trails. Ride along quiet mountain lakes, majestic forests or steep canyons.

FIND YOUR OWN WAY DOWN THE MOUNTAIN



Play it safe and take a relaxing ride on the scenic route or take the risk and go cross-country to find the fastest way down to the finish line.

EXPLORE AN UNSPOILED NATURE



Experience a beautiful nature unspoiled by men. No audience, no barrier tapes – just you and your bike.

UNLOCK NEW BIKES, PAINT JOBS & OUTFITS



Each bikes has different gameplay values. Beat the best-times or make your way down the mountain unharmed to unlock new paint jobs and outfits.

DIFFERENT MODES AND LEADERBOARDS



Unlock new difficulty modes, compete with your friends and prove your speed-running skills on your way to the top!

data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Danish, Portuguese, Swedish, Bulgarian, Czech, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Korean, Norwegian, Portuguese - Brazil, Romanian, Spanish - Latin America, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
data.reviews:
“The daredevil in me likes the idea of hurtling through a forest on two wheels at breakneck speed.”
Rock Paper Shotgun

“Best Indie Games of Gamescom 2017”
IGN

“The mountain biking game I never knew I needed.”
PCGamer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti / AMD Radeon HD 7870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: These specifications are subject to change.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500 / AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: These specifications are subject to change.
